  • Constructor Details

    • player

      public player(String name, int id, Team team, ArrayList<piece> pieces)
      constructor: constructs new player with the giver parameters
      Precontions: name must not be null and id must be > 0
      Postcontions: initialises the new player with the giver values
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      id - of player
      team - team of the player(enum: ICE or FIRE)

    • calcCapturedPieces

      public int calcCapturedPieces()
      calculates how many of the players pieces are captured by traversing the array of his pieced and checking the iscaptured bool

      Postcondition:calculates how many pieces of a player are captured

      Returns:
      # of captured pieces

    • haslostFromMoves

      public boolean haslostFromMoves(boardCopy board, boolean NoRetriteRule)
      Observer:observes if a player has lost fron not having any valid moves Postcontions: will determine if a player has no moves(he lost)
      Returns:
      true if he has lost, false if he has not lost.
